p: The purposes of this study were to microencapsulate cinnamaldehyde-type leaf oil of C. osmophloeum with Î²-cyclodextrin and examine the properties of the resulting leaf oil microcapsules. It was expected that the preservation of C. osmophloeum leaf oil would improve. Xanthine oxidase inhibitory activity and thermostability of C. osmophloeum leaf oil microcapsules were investigated to confirm the properties of the leaf oil microcapsules.
